HCaptcha¶

To import this module:

from python3_captchaai.hcaptcha import HCaptcha
class hcaptcha.HCaptcha(api_key, captcha_type, websiteURL=None, websiteKey=None, queries=None, question=None, proxyType=None, proxyAddress=None, proxyPort=None, sleep_time=5, request_url='https://api.captchaai.io')¶

The class is used to work with CaptchaAI HCaptcha methods.

Parameters:

  • api_key (str) – CaptchaAI API key

  • captcha_type (Union[CaptchaTypeEnm, str]) – Captcha type name, like HCaptchaTaskProxyless and etc.

  • websiteURL (Optional[str]) – Address of a webpage with hCaptcha

  • websiteKey (Optional[str]) – hCaptcha website key

  • queries (Optional[List[str]]) – Base64-encoded images, do not include “data : image / *** ; base64,”. Format to send: [“base64”,”base64”,”base64”,…..]

  • question (Optional[str]) – Question ID. Support English and Chinese, other languages please convert yourself

  • proxyType (Optional[Union[ProxyType, str]]) – Type of the proxy

  • proxyAddress (Optional[str]) – Proxy IP address IPv4/IPv6. Not allowed to use: host names instead of IPs, transparent proxies (where client IP is visible), proxies from local networks (192.., 10.., 127…)

  • proxyPort (Optional[int]) – Proxy port.

  • sleep_time (Optional[int]) – The waiting time between requests to get the result of the Captcha

  • request_url (Optional[str]) – API address for sending requests

Examples

>>> HCaptcha(api_key="CAI-1324...",
...          captcha_type="HCaptchaTaskProxyless",
...          websiteURL="https://accounts.hcaptcha.com/demo",
...          websiteKey="a5f74b19-9e45-40e0-b45d-47ff91b7a6c2",
...         ).captcha_handler()
CaptchaResponseSer(errorId=False
                   errorCode=None
                   errorDescription=None
                   taskId=None
                   status=<ResponseStatusEnm.Ready: 'ready'>
                   solution={'gRecaptchaResponse': '44795sds'}
                  )
Returns:

CaptchaResponseSer model with full server response

Notes

https://captchaai.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/CAPTCHAAI/pages/426247 https://captchaai.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/CAPTCHAAI/pages/394005 https://captchaai.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/CAPTCHAAI/pages/426261

captcha_handler(**additional_params)¶

Synchronous method for captcha solving

Parameters:

additional_params – Some additional parameters that will be used in creating the task and will be passed to the payload under task key. Like coordinate, enterprisePayload and etc. - more info in service docs

Return type:

CaptchaResponseSer

Examples

>>> HCaptcha(api_key="CAI-BA9650D2B9C2786B21120D512702E010",
...          captcha_type='HCaptchaTaskProxyless',
...          websiteURL="https://accounts.hcaptcha.com/demo",
...          websiteKey="a5f74b19-9e45-40e0-b45d-47ff91b7a6c2",
...         ).captcha_handler()
CaptchaResponseSer(errorId=False
                   errorCode=None
                   errorDescription=None
                   taskId=None
                   status=<ResponseStatusEnm.Ready: 'ready'>
                   solution={'gRecaptchaResponse': '44795sds'}
                  )
Returns:

CaptchaResponseSer model with full service response

Return type:

CaptchaResponseSer

Check class docstirng for more info

async aio_captcha_handler(**additional_params)¶

Asynchronous method for captcha solving

Parameters:

additional_params – Some additional parameters that will be used in creating the task and will be passed to the payload under task key. Like coordinate, enterprisePayload and etc. - more info in service docs

Return type:

CaptchaResponseSer

Examples

>>> await HCaptcha(api_key="CAI-BA9650D2B9C2786B21120D512702E010",
...                captcha_type='HCaptchaTaskProxyless',
...                websiteURL="https://accounts.hcaptcha.com/demo",
...                websiteKey="a5f74b19-9e45-40e0-b45d-47ff91b7a6c2",
...               ).aio_captcha_handler()
CaptchaResponseSer(errorId=False
                   errorCode=None
                   errorDescription=None
                   taskId=None
                   status=<ResponseStatusEnm.Ready: 'ready'>
                   solution={'gRecaptchaResponse': '44795sds'}
                  )
